I spent more than a couple of hours in this game with my friends.. And all I can say is that it is very fun and satisfying to 360 that killer.

But jokes aside, this game has improved a lot since I've first bought it in 2017, perks got better and balanced and so did the killers. Right now it does not depend on what Survivor/Killer you are choosing to play, the Killer has the exact same chance to win as much as all the Survivors do, only skill depends on what turn of events happen.
Gr8 game. Playing a few weeks. And it's fun when your playing with friends.
it s a fun game,you have to be smart to win

Para quem quer se divertir, ou at√© mesmo jogar a s√©rio, √© um game muito divertido e que vale a pena.

Dito isso, como qualquer jogo, possui seus pontos negativos.
Nesse game, fica sua comunidade (em grande parte) extremamente t√≥xica, e o matchmaker (razoavelmente) quebrado...

Em rela√ß√£o a comunidade t√≥xica, n√£o tem muito o que se dizer. Vemos isso direto em diversos jogos.
O real problema √© o matchmaker quebrado.
Muitas vezes vc √© iniciante, t√° l√° jogando como killer ou survivor, e a outra parte vem algu√©m de rank alt√≠ssimo, fazendo com que voc√™ n√£o consiga jogar e n√£o aprenda direito como o game funciona, ou mesmo os macetes dos mapas.
N√£o √© toda partida que isso ocorre, bem verdade, mas √© dif√≠cil passar um dia sem ao menos uma partida assim.
Contudo, mesmo em um matchmaker quebrado, se a outra parte (e vc mesmo) n√£o forem t√≥xicos, ainda d√° pra se divertir.

I bought this game thinking it will be a good game to play, with my friends, instead it was the opposite, my whole life has been falling apart because of this game. I have now played 100 minutes with still no escape, it reminds me of reality, as i can never escape the feeling of loneliness and depression. I ready up and i ready up but each game my friends use me as bait "AS BAIT" i repeat myself in anger because this is heartbreaking, they wont even go up and help save me but instead take care of themselfs. This game has messed up my life and now i have sleep anixety because of the traumatising things i have experienced in this game. Overall 10/10 very good game
